product_name: SRAM X9 2x10 Top-Pull Front Derailleur - Low Clamp
long_description: This SRAM X9 2x10 top-pull front derailleur has been optimized for fast, smooth shifting for your trail-riding stoke fests. Steel construction stands up to demanding use; derailleur cage performance is optimized for efficient, powerful shifts and little-to-no chain rub in cross-chain combinations. Designed for use with 2x10 cranksets; max ring capacity of 42 teeth. Low-mount clamp fits 31.8 or 34.9 seat tubes (adapter included). Use with top-pull cable routing.
short_description: This SRAM X9 2x10 top-pull front derailleur has been optimized for fast, smooth shifting for your trail-riding stoke fests.
